metadata.subject: Proscription
Confiscations
metadata.title: Des assassinats et des vols politiques, ou, Des proscriptions et des confiscations /
metadata.creator: Servan, J.-M.-A. (Joseph-Michel-Antoine), 1737-1807.
Servan, J.-M.-A. (Joseph-Michel-Antoine), 1737-1807
Raynal, abbé (Guillaume-Thomas-François), 1713-1796, attributed name
Desenne, Victor, publisher
metadata.publisher: A Londres [i.e. Paris?] ;Et se trouve a Paris : Chez Desenne, imprimeur-libraire, au Palais-Egalité, nos. 1 et 2,
metadata.citation: Quérard, J.M. Supercheries littéraires (2. éd.), III, column 340
metadata.description: Fictitiously attributed to Guillaume-Thomas-François Raynal; by Joseph-Michel-Antoine Servan. Cf. Quérard
Fictitious imprint; probably printed in Paris. Cf. ESTC
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:1, 28815
metadata.notes: Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
